atk-s0403a12:2_1: Tatiyassa catutthe nappaṭibaloti kāyabalena ca ñāṇabalena ca asamannāgato.
atk-s0403a12:4_1: Pañcame anāyussāti āyupacchedanā, na āyuvaḍḍhanā. Chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0403a12:6_1: Sattame nālaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsitunti saṅghato nikkhamitvā ekako vasituṁ na yutto.
atk-s0403a12:6_2: Kāmañcesa saṅghamajjhepi vasituṁ ayuttova asaṅghasobhanatāya, ovādānusāsanippaṭibaddhattā pana nippariyāyeneva saṅghamhā vapakāsituṁ na yutto.
atk-s0403a12:6_3: Alaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsitunti cātuddisattā saṅghamhā nikkhamma ekako vasituṁ yutto, saṅghasobhanatāya pana saṅghepi vasituṁ yuttoyeva. Aṭṭhamaṁ uttānatthameva.
